title: Homepage Loads with Featured Products and Hero Banner
description: Verify that the homepage loads successfully with hero banners, featured products grid, and primary CTAs visible and functional.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage URL
Check that the hero banner section is displayed with proper images and text
Verify featured products grid is visible with product images, titles, and prices
Verify that CTA buttons (e.g., Shop Now) on homepage work and navigate to expected pages

title: Product Listing Filters and Sorting Functionality
description: Verify product collection pages support filtering by price, fabric/type, color and support sorting by price/popularity.

steps.description: Open a collection products listing page
Apply price range filter and verify product results update accordingly
Apply fabric/type filter and verify products match selected fabrics/types
Apply color filter and verify products match selected colors
Change sorting option to price ascending and verify product order
Check that filters can be combined and results reflect all applied filters

title: Product Detail Page Displays Correct Variant Options
description: Verify that on a product detail page, all variant selectors (color, blouse options) are displayed, selectable, and that selecting variants updates price and stock availability correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to a product detail page with multiple variants
Check that variant options for color and blouse are shown
Select each available variant option and verify the displayed price updates accordingly
Product stock availability updates correctly based on selected variants

title: Add to Cart with Variant Selection and Stock Validation
description: Verify that users can add products with specific variants to the shopping cart. Cart should enforce stock validation preventing adding quantities exceeding stock.

steps.description: Select product variants on product detail page
Add a valid quantity (<= available stock) of the product to the cart
Verify the cart is updated with the selected product, variant, and quantity
Attempt to add a quantity greater than available stock to the cart
Cart prevents adding quantity exceeding stock and displays appropriate error message

title: Shopping Cart Persistence Across Sessions
description: Ensure that the shopping cart contents persist across browsing sessions using localStorage, and quantities can be updated with stock validation.

steps.description: Add products with variants to the cart
Close the browser tab and reopen the site
Verify that the previously added cart items are still present with correct quantities
Update the quantity of a cart item within available stock limits
Cart updates the quantity and recalculates totals correctly
Attempt to update quantity beyond stock and verify error handling

title: Checkout Process with Shipping/Billing and Razorpay Integration
description: Verify the complete checkout flow including form validation for shipping and billing addresses, stock reservation, Razorpay payment flow, and confirmation on successful payment.

steps.description: Proceed to checkout from the cart page
Fill in valid shipping and billing information with all required fields
Check form validations trigger for missing or invalid inputs
Submit the order to initiate Razorpay payment
Backend reserves stock upon order initiation, preventing overselling
Complete the Razorpay payment flow successfully
Order status updates to 'Paid' and stock is committed
Simulate Razorpay payment failure
Reserved stock rolls back and order is not confirmed

title: Order Tracking Timeline Displays Real-time Status Updates
description: Verify that the order tracking page shows an Amazon-style status timeline accurately reflecting the order status from pending to delivered with shipment details.

steps.description: Login and navigate to an active order's tracking page
Check that the order status timeline correctly shows current order status stages
Simulate status updates backend (pending, processing, shipped, delivered)
Verify timeline updates in real-time to reflect those status changes
Order shipment details such as tracking number and carrier information are displayed correctly

title: Admin Dashboard Secure Login and JWT Authentication
description: Verify that the admin dashboard login requires valid credentials, enforces JWT authentication, and restricts unauthorized access.

steps.description: Navigate to the admin dashboard login page
Attempt login with invalid credentials
Verify login is rejected and error message is displayed
Login with valid admin credentials
Verify JWT token is received and stored securely
Try accessing admin dashboard pages without JWT or with expired token
Verify access is denied and user is redirected to login page

title: Admin Product Management CRUD Operations
description: Validate that the admin can create, read, update, and delete products, variants, collections, and offers successfully through the admin dashboard UI.

steps.description: Login to admin dashboard
Navigate to product management page
Create a new product with multiple variants and assign to a collection
Verify the new product and variants appear in the product list and frontend properly
Update product details such as price, description, and variant stock levels
Ensure updates are saved and reflected on frontend product pages
Delete a product and verify it disappears from listing and frontend

title: CSV Bulk Import for Products, Variants, Stock, and Offers
description: Verify that uploading CSV files via the admin import interface correctly creates or updates products, variants, stock levels, and offer data without data loss or corruption.

steps.description: Login to admin dashboard and navigate to CSV import page
Upload a valid CSV file containing multiple products with variants, stock, and offers
Verify import succeeds without errors and a success message is shown
Check on the product management page that imported products and variants are present with correct details
Upload malformed or incomplete CSV data
Verify the system detects errors and reports them without corrupting existing data

title: AI Chatbot Responds with Accurate Product Recommendations and Insights
description: Verify that the AI chatbot integrated into the frontend and admin interfaces responds accurately based on product database, current stock, and active offers using secure backend endpoints.

steps.description: Open AI chatbot on customer-facing site
Ask chatbot for saree recommendations within specific color or fabric preferences
Verify chatbot responses include relevant products currently in stock and reflect active offers
Open AI chatbot on admin dashboard
Query for sales analytics or stock alerts
Check chatbot provides real-time insights based on backend data securely
Attempt unauthorized API requests to the chatbot backend
Confirm access is denied without proper authentication tokens

title: Frontend UI Visual Consistency with Editorial Black-and-White Theme
description: Verify that the frontend pages consistently adhere to the black-and-white editorial theme with full-color product imagery, including Header and Footer components and responsive behavior across devices.

steps.description: Navigate to multiple pages: homepage, product listings, product detail, offers, checkout, order tracking
Check that global layout uses consistent black-and-white typography, backgrounds, and UI components
Product images display full color against black-and-white theme backgrounds
Verify header menu, search, cart icon, and footer links are styled consistently
Resize browser window or use mobile device emulation
Ensure pages remain visually consistent and responsive with no layout breakage

title: Performance and Security on Vercel Deployment
description: Verify fast page load performance for critical pages and secure authentication flows using Supabase and JWT on the Vercel deployment environment.

steps.description: Access the deployed site on Vercel for homepage, product detail, cart, checkout, and admin pages
Measure page load times and verify they are within acceptable performance thresholds
Test authentication flows for customer login and admin login using Supabase
Verify that JWT tokens are used where expected and that secure pages block unauthorized access
Attempt to access API endpoints without authentication and with expired JWT
Ensure API returns proper error codes and denies access
